TopicTitle: Kerbal Engineer Redux 1.1.7.2 not functioning correctly with version 11.1

Articles.Content:
I am having a problem playing KSP version 11.1 with KER 1.1.7.2. I noticed the delta v was incorrect when looking at a craft I built before the update.  I did some testing, and now the mod will not let me see the delta v stats when putting a booster on. I would have to put the booster on, grab another random item from the item list, and then immediately drop the item for the delta v stats to show up. I also noticed that when I added more parts to my vessel, parts that did not have any fuel, my delta v would go up. I tested this by building a craft with 2,000 delta v, then stacked like 3 mobile processing labs on top of it, and the delta v changed from 2,000 to 7,000 with no added fuel and only added weight. 

I was wondering if yall have experienced this or heard about issues with KER with update 11.1

No, I have never used this forum before and just started playing ksp about a month ago.

There was a change to the way KSP calculates delta-V values, maybe KER needs an update to match it? It’s a brand new version of the game, there will be some niggles until mod makers can update their mods to reflect the latest changes.
